mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CPR_CARD (CPR_CARD_NO, CPR_CARD_NM, CPR_CARD_CHRG_CMPNY) VALUES (#{cprCardNo}, #{cprCardNm}, #{cprCardChrgCmpny})
mapper.select: SELECT CPR_CARD_NO, CPR_CARD_NM, CPR_CARD_CHRG_CMPNY, CPR_CARD_STTUS FROM CPR_CARD ORDER BY CPR_CARD_STTUS

SELECT C.CPR_CARD_RESVE_SN, C.CPR_CARD_RESVE_BEGIN_DATE, C.CPR_CARD_RESVE_CLOS_DATE, C.CPR_CARD_RESVE_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM AS CPR_CARD_RESVE_EMPL_NM FROM CPR_CARD_RESVE C, EMPL E WHERE COMMON_CODE_RESVE_AT = 'RESVE010' AND C.CPR_CARD_RESVE_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID ORDER BY CPR_CARD_RESVE_SN
mapper.update:
{CALL DECLARE BEGIN UPDATE CPR_CARD_RESVE SET CPR_CARD_NO = #{cprCardNo}, COMMON_CODE_RESVE_AT = 'RESVE011' WHERE CPR_CARD_RESVE_SN = #{cprCardResveSn};
UPDATE CPR_CARD SET CPR_CARD_STTUS = 1 WHERE CPR_CARD_NO = #{cprCardNo}; END}
mapper.select: SELECT CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_SN, CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_BEGIN_DATE, CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_CLOS_DATE, CR.CPR_CARD_NO, C.CPR_CARD_NM, CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM AS CPR_CARD_RESVE_EMPL_NM, CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_RTURN_AT FROM CPR_CARD_RESVE CR, CPR_CARD C, EMPL E WHERE CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND CR.CPR_CARD_NO = C.CPR_CARD_NO AND COMMON_CODE_RESVE_AT = 'RESVE011' ORDER BY CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_RTURN_AT ASC, CR.CPR_CARD_RESVE_SN DESC
